title: (x) Avatar movie logo - customised Papyrus {Christian Lauritzen}
content:
my daughter is completly mesmerized by this film.. so I thought I would print her a T-shirt.  
What font did they use?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302160438im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Avatar_5223.png)
author: rosmedia

comments.content: Looks like Papyrus, but it's not.. But maybe close enough to fool your daughter

Thanx guys..  
sorry I did not know it had been threaded earlier.  
I should have done a search first.  
sorry

and also I should have read this book in the 1970'ies... then maybe I would have been richer than I am today.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302160438im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CompOp_5852.jpg)
